Word dict to dict convertor
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. py:module:: langsim.modules.word_dictionary.word_dict_to_dict

+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| Path       | langsim.modules.word_dictionary.word_dict_to_dict |
+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| Executable | yes                                               |
+------------+---------------------------------------------------+

Take a word dictionary (that stores all the characters making up a word) and produce a standard dictionary
datatype.


Inputs
======

No inputs

Outputs
=======

No outputs
